title: ICE with unicode identifiers
body:
``` rust
fn main() {
    enum Sets { ℕ, ℝ, ℤ };
    println(fmt!("%?", (ℕ, ℝ, ℤ)))
}
```

These are in the `XID_Start` unicode category [according to this](http://unicode.org/cldr/utility/list-unicodeset.jsp?a=[%3AXID_Start%3A]&g=).
